message.content:
# Session Context
*Created: 2026-01-09*

Building flashcard app from scratch. Key requirements:
- FastHTML + fastlite (SQLite)
- Card dataclass with id, front, back, next_review, interval
- CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete
- Study routes: /study, /study/{id}/reveal, /study/{id}/rate
- SM-2 algorithm: Again=1, Hard=1.2x, Good=2x, Easy=3x

# Cognition State

## Inherited Knowledge

Task 001 delivered: Card dataclass with id, front, back, next_review, interval; fastlite db initialized in main.py

## Operational State

Last sequence: 001
Recent: 001_data-model_complete.md

---

Campaign: Build the flashcard app per README.md
Task: 002 routes-crud

CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete

Delta: `/Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v31/main.py`, `/Users/cck/CC/plugins/marketplaces/crinzo-plugins/scratch/anki-v31/test_app.py`
Depends: data-model (001 complete)
Done when: GET / redirects to /cards; GET /cards lists all cards; GET /cards/new shows form; POST /cards/new creates card and redirects 303; POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card and redirects 303; tests for card creation, listing, deletion pass
Verify: `uv run pytest test_app.py -k card`

# Session Context
*Created: 2026-01-09*

## Git State
Branch: main
Recent commits: eval runs

## Test Commands
`uv run pytest test_app.py -v`

## Codebase Snapshot

Building flashcard app from scratch. Key requirements:
- FastHTML + fastlite (SQLite)
- Card dataclass with id, front, back, next_review, interval
- CRUD routes: /, /cards, /cards/new, /cards/{id}/delete
- Study routes: /study, /study/{id}/reveal, /study/{id}/rate
- SM-2 algorithm: Again=1, Hard=1.2x, Good=2x, Easy=3x
- next_review = today + interval days

Planner has analyzed this codebase. Key findings are embedded in campaign tasks.
Do not re-analyze. Trust the task specifications.

- GET /cards → list all cards

- POST /cards/new → create card and redirect 303

- POST /cards/{id}/delete removes card and redirects 303
